title: San Diego/La Jolla
name: Hyatt Regency La Jolla at Aventine

reviews.content: The price they charge for room....is nothing, absolutely free....every one can efford this hotel surrounding.....with all kind of resturant and shopping area and free trip to parks.....and in morning breakfast....they have everything even u dont need to take lunch.....the people are nice and friendly....we had a very good time...and we miss that palce....
reviews.author: Trenton Bayer

description: Situated on 11 acres, 419 recently remodeled rooms, spacious VIP suites, wireless high-speed Internet, and 32,000 square feet of flexible function space.
